response.overview: MEAT is the story of a young woman named Kara, who was ridiculued in her youth for being overweight. Her rival Annie and all of Annie's friends not only relentlessly humilated Kara, but also tortured her brother Jed for being mentally retarded. Annie vowed that one day she will be beautiful, but exercise and dieting wasn't helping her. While vacationing in Africa, Kara and Jed ran into an ingenious tribe who taught her the mystical process of Transference.
response.title: Meat
